name: WalkPHL
description: This application was built for people visiting the city of Philadelphia. Travelers can earn badges for first time visits at any specified landmark

name: AlumniPortal
description: After students graduate from the coding bootcamp Tech Elevator, they will be invited to join the alumni portal where the graduates can share information with each other

name: SocialApe
description: Users can write posts and share with the global feed (Twitter clone)
